section.title: Technical Description
section.para: InterMine is a general purpose object-oriented data warehouse system developed as part of FlyMine project. InterMine enables configurable integration of complex data from multiple sources into a single query-optimised object database.

FlyMine is built using InterMine with primary focus on Drosophila, Anopheles and other insects. The FlyMine model is generated from existing and emerging ontologies and standards (MAGE, SO, PSI and others).
StemCellMine adapts the FlyMine system to integrate data sets useful for Stem Cell researchers.

A powerful and flexible query interface enables users to perform arbitrary and complex queries across the data either via a web interface or a programming interface. Users are not confined to 'fill-in-the-blanks' query templates or predefined queries. However, simpler access is available via such template queries.
